[60FPS (Hold B button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 00000000
204BECC0 00000001
DD000000 00000002
204BECC0 00000002
D0000000 00000000
{Game runs normal. (except cinematics)
Codes by @Reshiban}

[60FPS (Fix cutscenes)]
004BECC0 00000001
D0000000 00000000
5049416C 00000000
004BECC0 00000002
D2000000 00000000
{Game runs normal.
Codes by @Reshiban
Edited by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS]
004BECC0 00000001
{Game runs normal. (except cinematics)
Codes by @Reshiban}

[Default 30FPS]
004BECC0 00000002
{Game runs normal. (except cinematics)
Codes by @Reshiban}

[++Advanced++]

[60FPS=X / 30FPS=Y v1]
D3000000 00000000
DD000000 00000400
D5000001 00000001
DF000002 00020000
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000800
D5000001 00000002
DF000002 00020000
D0000000 00000000
DFFFFFFF 00000003
60000000 004BECC0
DF000002 00010000
D0000000 00000000
D8000000 004BECC0
D2000000 00000000
{Game runs normal. (except cinematics)
Codes by @Reshiban
Edited by @monkeyman4412}

DF000002 00020000
D0000000 00000000
